thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: GARY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GARY

author: GARY
title: GARY
text: They weren't rude, it did not get to that stage. They offered little help to solve our problems. We had no time to argue because we had an appointment to go to. The problems were - They did not have the car which was booked, so we were held up leaving the Airport while trying to sort it out. Their solution they provided was to give us a similar vehicle but charge us more, they would not honor the agreement. We still have not got our bond back, 10 days since returning the car.
